questions.clue: It is the first state of the fifty United States to list their web site URL on a license plate.
The first baseball stadium was built in Pittsburgh here
Home to the chocolate capital of the United States (Hershey)
The first daily newspaper was published here in 1784
The first oil well was opened in Titusville in 1859
Betsy Ross supposedly made the first American Flag in Philadephia in this state
